page.title: 16West Haddon Cricket Club
page.content: Two years ago the Cricket Club felt they had to involve the village in their activities if they were to survive. A six-a-side competition was announced for groups within the village. The Church, individual streets, the local ladies hockey team and even one family entered. The weather was wonderful and was a great success. This year the event was repeated. More teams entered making it another successful day. This year too, the Club won a similar competition for local Cricket Clubs. The cloud hanging over the future of the Club is the possible loss of the use of the rented playing field. So the next priority is the enormous task of trying to raise the money to buy the playing field.
